content.rendered:
Play Santa Claus Game Online

Santa Claus Winter Challenge is an amazing and free to play online puzzle game suitable for all ages. You need to draw the road for our cute Santaclaus and collect as many gifts as possible. Avoid obstacles on the road.

Santa Claus Winter Challenge is a simple 2D drawing game where you help Santa in 20 levels to avoid various obstacles and reach the final point. In each level, you are drawing a path the Santa is walking on. Help Santa to complete all 20 levels. Have fun!

Best Santa Claus Games

  • Santa Claus
  • Santa Claus in Trouble (HD)
  • My Santa Claus
  • Santa Claus in trouble…again!
  • Santa Claus Wali Game
  • Farm Snow – Santa family story
  • Adolescent Santa Claus
  • Santa Claus Saves the Earth
  • In the Service of Mrs. Claus
  • Santa Run
  • Scary Santa Claus Horror Game
  • Winter Clash 3D – Christmas Sh
  • Amazing Santa – Fun Kids Games
  • Santa Claus: Gift Delivery
  • Crime Santa
  • Angry Santa Claus
  • Sweet Baby Girl Christmas 2
  • Toddlers Christmas Dress
  • Santa Hop
  • Runner Santa Claus
  • Shave Santa®
  • Santa Claus Gift Delivery
  • Santa Rescue
  • Santa Memory
  • The Official Father Christmas
  • Santa City Run Game

What are the most popular Santa Claus Games?

  • Snow Battle
  • Touch and Catch Being Santa
  • Christmas Picture Puzzle
  • Sliding Santa
  • Santa Claus Rush
  • Santa Run
  • NEW YEARS PUZZLES
  • KOGAMA: Xmas Parkour
  • Santa’s Quest
  • Stick Santa

Which Santa Claus Games can be played for free?

  • Snow Battle
  • Touch and Catch Being Santa
  • Christmas Picture Puzzle
  • Sliding Santa
  • Santa Claus Rush
